body.name: Tiptiper Full Size Bed Frame with Headboard Storage, Upholstered with LED Lights and Charging Station, Platform Bed with Sturdy Wooden Slats Support, No Box Spring Needed, Dark Grey
features: 【RGB LED Lights in the Headboard】The LED lights can be controlled by remote control or by mobile APP. Bring a dreamy feel to your room. Controlled by the remote control, there are 16 colors, 6 brightness adjustments and 4 lighting modes. With APP control, the LED light has more than 60,000 colors to choose from, the brightness can be adjusted, and there are other modes to change the color of the light: style mode, music mode, microphone mode. In addition, there is a timing function controlled by the APP, which can preset the time to turn on and off the LED light.

【Charging Station with Outlets & USB Ports】The power strip built into the headboard has 2 outlets and 2 USB ports, making it very convenient for you to charge your phone, tablet, headphones and other electronic devices within your reach or use a book light to easily read while lying in bed.

【Storage Headboard with Adjustable Height】The storage headboard has 3 compartments and shelves. It can also be opened and has an internal storage space, which allows you to store some bedding, books, decorations, or other items. In addition, there are small cloth pockets on both sides of the headboard, where the remote control, mobile phone, and glasses can be easily placed. Headboard Adjustable Height: 43.7"-47.7". It can hold full size mattresses of different thicknesses from 10 inches to 14 inches.

【Sturdy Construction & Strong Support】Our stylish and functional fabric upholstered platform bed has 12 sturdy wood slats, 2 metal supports, and 9 support legs(middle 3 legs are height adjustable), each slat is 2''W, slat spacing is 3.9''W. The sturdy metal and wood framework system provides strong support easily up to 880 LBS, giving your mattress the support and protection it needs! This Dark Grey Bed brings classic style and convenient functionality to any room.

【Modern Style】The classic neutral linen fabric combined with the rustic brown wood plank is perfect for a variety of bedroom styles and adds glamour to the room. And the linen fabric on the bed frame is skin-friendly, breathable and wear-resistant.

【Easy to Assemble】This upholstered bed with storage headboard is well packaged in 1 box. Everything you need to install this platform bed is included in the shipping box (all parts, tools, instructions). Assembly can be completed in a very short time. If you have any questions, please contact us and we will try our best to answer them.

【No Box Spring Needed】The base of this platform bed has a solid wood and metal support structure system, 12 solid wood strips, 2 metal supports and 9 legs (including floor protectors) provide a flat and firm structure for your mattress a stable surface. Wood and metal base frames support latex, memory foam, or mattresses very well. This means your bed can support any kind of full size mattress to maximize your comfort. No spring box is required.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A sound night’s sleep is one of life’s greatest pleasures. Choose the right bed and you’ll always rest easily~

This modern linen fabric upholstered bed brings classic style and convenient functionality to any room~ The power strip with 2 outlets & 2 USB ports The storage headboard with compartments, shelves, and internal storage space Will enhance your bedroom in myriad ways, make your life easier~

Specifications Size Full Size Color Dark Grey & Rustic Brown Material Solid Wood & Linen Fabric & Metal Product Dimensions 79’’L x 54.3’’W x (43.7’’-47.7’’)H --- Adjustable Height Headboard Weight Capacity 880 LBS Feature 1 Power Strip with 2 Outlets & 2 USB Ports Feature 2 Storage Headboard with Internal Storage Space and LED Lights Package Content Bed frame, Storage Headboard, LED Lights, Remote Control, Power Strip, Wood Slats, Assembly Kit, Instructions (Mattress Not Included) Assembly Required Yes, Easy Box Spring Required No

Easy Assembly & Sturdy Structure Super Easy To Assemble! You can put it together in less than an hour with simple instructions. 12 Sturdy Wood Slats, 2 Metal Supports, and 9 Support Legs provide strong support easily up to 880 LBS! Storage Headboard with Power Strip The Power Strip with 2 Outlets & 2 USB Ports. The Storage Headboard with compartments, shelves, and internal storage space, Will enhance your bedroom in myriad ways, make your life easier~ There is a cloth pocket on each side of the headboard for your phone, remote control or other small things. Protect Your Mattress This Sturdy Bed frame provides excellent support for a mattress and maximizes ventilation from the bottom so the mattress maintains the right temperature and doesn't grow mildew.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Assemble - Looks Great!
reviews.reviewText: My kid was growing out of his twin bed so this was a necessity purchase! The bed was easy to assemble - under an hour and the product is made of decent quality. LED lights are bright, extra storage works great - my kid loves the outlet for his alarm clock and phone. Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice bedframe!
reviews.reviewText: Good bedframe, easy to assemble. It took me and my partner an hour to put it together, and it could have been done with one person if needed. The LED strip took more work to figure out than the bedframe. We couldn't figure out how to turn it on, but our roomate was able to get it working. The only downside is the wood that keep the matrass up are very thin and break easily. We've already snapped 3 and are planning to just replace them all with sturdier wood from Home Depot. It's a very nice bedframe overall.

reviews.reviewerName: Didn’t realize the numbers were small on bottom the page for the dates and also months in a different language, however the photos are nice
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this bed
reviews.reviewText: So comfortable. Affordable. Easy to assemble. Still steady to this day .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars sturdy and nice
reviews.reviewText: been using for a few months. sturdy and nice. was pretty easy to put together. Worth it for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy assembly. Good quality. Looks great.
reviews.reviewText: I would recommend this bed frame. If you aregetting a full sized mattress,the frame does adjust heights but, it doesn’t show you how until the end of the instructions, so if you wanna do it, you have to do it at the start, otherwise you’ll have to take it apart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bed frame
reviews.reviewText: I bought this after about a month of searching and I'm so happy I did! Easy to put together(about an hour or so). Everything fit perfect and the end product is just awesome! Sturdy, the lights are very cool and I love the storage and outlets, plus 2 usb ports! Excellent purchase and would for sure buy again!!! Great prices and seller also!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame is great! Bought for my son put it together and he is still loving it ♥️ all the space it has , the LED lights are an awesome touch and the outlet right on the headboard for charging his phone is amazing! The best bed frame yet 🙌🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for heavy people
reviews.reviewText: So I bought because I moved and wanted a nicer bed (because I felt I deserved it). I put it together a week before I left for vacation, I came back and slept on it maybe two weeks total and the middle metal support beams broke. ( no I do not just plop down on my bed or jump, I lay in one spot and that’s it).Says it can hold up to 880 lbs or more I’m guessing but I’m about 300 and it failed. I did get ahold of the manufacturer and they said they sent the parts out again and haven’t received anything to replace the beams. So I bought a whole new frame that I just rigged to connect to the headboard.Three stars because the headboard is the cool part and is really handy and I’m glad it is now rigged to a new frame.Would have only gave one star of the headboard wasn’t so neat. Very disappointed in the money I spent on this as a gift to myself and it broke after two weeks of just sleeping in it
